lead_paragraph: Norwich City striker Dieumerci Mbokani said he will no longer play for Democratic Republic of Congo, complaining of unfair treatment by football authorities there after he missed two African Nations Cup games following the Brussels airport bombing.

headline.print_headline: Norwich Striker Mbokani Says Quits DR Congo Over 'Unfair' Treatment
headline.main: Norwich Striker Mbokani Says Quits DR Congo Over 'Unfair' Treatment
